SVGRadialGradientElement.summary: The SVGRadialGradientElement interface corresponds to the RadialGradient element.

SVGRadialGradientElementFr.summary: The fr read-only property of the interface describes the radius of the focal circle of the radial gradient as an . It reflects the computed value of the {{SVGAttr("fr")}} attribute on the {{SVGElement("radialGradient")}} element.

remarks.para: The attribute value is a <length>, <percentage>, or <number>. The numeric value of the is the radius of the focal point of the radial gradient in the user coordinate system.

SVGRadialGradientElementR.summary: The r read-only property of the interface describes the radius of the radial gradient as an . It reflects the computed value of the {{SVGAttr("r")}} attribute on the {{SVGElement("radialGradient")}} element.

remarks.para: The attribute value is a <length>, <percentage>, or <number>. The numeric value of the is the radius of the radial gradient in the user coordinate system.

SVGRadialGradientElementFy.summary: The fy read-only property of the interface describes the y-axis coordinate of the focal point of the radial gradient as an . It reflects the computed value of the {{SVGAttr("fy")}} attribute on the {{SVGElement("radialGradient")}} element.

remarks.para: The attribute value is a <length>, <percentage>, or <number>. The numeric value of the is the y-coordinate of the focal point of the radial gradient in the user coordinate system.

SVGRadialGradientElementCx.summary: The cx read-only property of the interface describes the x-axis coordinate of the center of the radial gradient as an . It reflects the computed value of the {{SVGAttr("cx")}} attribute on the {{SVGElement("radialGradient")}} element.

remarks.para: The attribute value is a <length>, <percentage>, or <number>. The numeric value of the is the x-coordinate of the radial gradient's center in the user coordinate system.

SVGRadialGradientElementCy.summary: The cy read-only property of the interface describes the y-axis coordinate of the center of the radial gradient as an . It reflects the computed value of the {{SVGAttr("cy")}} attribute on the {{SVGElement("radialGradient")}} element.

remarks.para: The attribute value is a <length>, <percentage>, or <number>. The numeric value of the is the y-coordinate of the radial gradient's center in the user coordinate system.

SVGRadialGradientElementFx.summary: The fx read-only property of the interface describes the x-axis coordinate of the focal point of the radial gradient as an . It reflects the computed value of the {{SVGAttr("fx")}} attribute on the {{SVGElement("radialGradient")}} element.

remarks.para: The attribute value is a <length>, <percentage>, or <number>. The numeric value of the is the x-coordinate of the focal point of the radial gradient in the user coordinate system.
